caption.p: Daily emergence of Callosobruchus maculatus (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae) exposed to the fumigant effect of Vanillosmopsis arborea essential oil, to solvent hexane at concentrations LC 1 (1.4481 μL L −1 of air), LC 10 (2.5784 μL L −1 of air), LC 25 (3.6051 μL L −1 of air) and LC 50 (5.2318 μL L −1 of air) and to the oil or solvent (control) for 45 days.
